author: Staff Writers With Alexandra Valencia
title: Bodies left on streets for days as Ecuador struggles to collect dead
description: Coronavirus: Bodies left on streets for days as Ecuador struggles to collect dead
content:
In Ecuador’s largest city of Guayaquil, the bodies of coronavirus victims are being left on the streets or kept inside family homes for days.
Officially, about 120 deaths have been reported across the country, with more than 80 in Guayaquil. But President Le… [+1777 chars]
